tool_description: A simple management and easy-to-use task scheduling.
name: Task Scheduler
title: Task Scheduler

api_list.name: Task Delete
api_list.description: Delete tasks need to specify the name of the task before you can delete the task

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: The name of the task you need to remove

api_list.name: Task Put
api_list.description: Additional or update task, if the task is not included in this section task to add, or update an existing task.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Define a task name, he must be unique.

required_parameters.name: type
required_parameters.description: Task type, task type: RunOnce (Executive), the Run Daily (performed on a daily basis), RunWeekly (weekly), RunMonthly (monthly execution).

required_parameters.name: date
required_parameters.description: Define the execution date, the default is the current date.

required_parameters.name: day
required_parameters.description: The number of days of the task intervals

required_parameters.name: space
required_parameters.description: The task repeat the interval length, minutes, and 0 means no Repeat.

required_parameters.name: last
required_parameters.description: The task repeated execution duration, the maximum value of 1440, or 24 hours, in minutes.

required_parameters.name: run
required_parameters.description: The need to request the network address, usually a URL address.

required_parameters.name: method
required_parameters.description: The task requests mode, request to get mode by default.

api_list.name: Test Run
api_list.description: Test your tasks can be run properly, and you can view the test data. Finally, the task is finished, you can via HTTP address: http://api.annice.com.cn/TaskScheduler/task name.txt, view the task execution results.

required_parameters.name: method
required_parameters.description: The task requests manner the current GET or POST.

required_parameters.name: run
required_parameters.description: Which means that a URL address.

api_list.name: Task Get
api_list.description: Task information need to specify the name of the task before they can get to the task information.

required_parameters.name: name
required_parameters.description: Get the name of the task information.
